name: Cyber 'Up
description:
2.5D Sidescroller beat em up with a cyberpunk theme.

2 short levels. This was done as part of a school summer course.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Left mouse - Punch

Right mouse - Heavy Punch

Space - Block

E - Interact

--------------------------------------------------------

Toni Vänttinen - Programmer

Jimi Savola - Programmer and Sounds/music

Lauri Laiho - Artist

Juhani Nevala - Artist
